net.corda.core.contracts

Class Structures

  • net.corda.core.contracts.Structures

  • public class Structures

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_ISSUER_REF_SIZE
      The maximum permissible size of an issuer reference.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SecureHash hash(ContractState $receiver)
      Returns the SHA-256 hash of the serialised contents of this state (not cached!)
      static SecureHash hash(ContractState $receiver, java.lang.String algorithm)
      Returns the hash of the serialised contents of this state (not cached!)
      static <T> Amount<T> withoutIssuer(Amount<net.corda.core.contracts.Issued> $receiver)
      Strips the issuer and returns an class Amount of the raw token directly. This is useful when you are mixing code that cares about specific issuers with code that will accept any, or which is imposing issuer constraints via some other mechanism and the additional type safety is not wanted.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_ISSUER_REF_SIZE

        public static int MAX_ISSUER_REF_SIZE

        The maximum permissible size of an issuer reference.

    • Method Detail

      • withoutIssuer

        public static <T> Amount<T> withoutIssuer(Amount<net.corda.core.contracts.Issued> $receiver)

        Strips the issuer and returns an class Amount of the raw token directly. This is useful when you are mixing code that cares about specific issuers with code that will accept any, or which is imposing issuer constraints via some other mechanism and the additional type safety is not wanted.

        See Also:
        class Amount

      • hash

        public static SecureHash hash(ContractState $receiver)

        Returns the SHA-256 hash of the serialised contents of this state (not cached!)

      • hash

        public static SecureHash hash(ContractState $receiver,
                              java.lang.String algorithm)

        Returns the hash of the serialised contents of this state (not cached!)
